alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 9:31PM CDT until August 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Southern Gosper County in south central Nebraska... Furnas County in south central Nebraska... Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 930 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elwood to near Wilsonville to near Jennings, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hendley around 940 PM CDT. Bertrand around 945 PM CDT. Beaver City and Loomis around 950 PM CDT. Holdrege and Hollinger around 955 PM CDT. Stamford around 1000 PM CDT. Funk around 1005 PM CDT. Orleans around 1010 PM CDT. Alma around 1015 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
